page.title: 01Cowtons:An Introduction
page.content: The block is mainly rural but contains the two villages of North and East Cowton. Set in the centre of a triangle between Darlington, Richmond and Northallerton. It is approx. 8 miles from each town. Pages 2&3 Introduction and population Page 4 Employment of residents Page 5 Agriculture Page 6 Education Page 7 Religion Pages 8&9 Clubs, general & sport Page 10 Recreation Page 11 Arts & Crafts Page 12 Lifestyles Page 13 Communications Pages 14&15 Housing & Home life Page 16 Social concerns Page 17 Local Customs Page 18 Recent events Page 19 Local History Page 20 Strange happenings & Credits
